text: Borna Ćorić was the defending champion but chose not to participate. Diego Schwartzman won the title after defeating Rogério Dutra Silva 6–4, 6–1 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Claro Open Barranquilla - Singles
title: 2016 Claro Open Barranquilla – Singles
